backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of auto-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that switches between flow steps with fade transitions and wraps providers for music and flow.
frontend/src/components/audio/MusicProvi: Context provider managing HTMLAudioElement playback state and exposing a toggle function.
frontend/src/components/audio/MusicToggl: Fixed-position button that displays play/pause icons and toggles background music.
frontend/src/components/controls/BackToL: Fixed top-left button using RomanticButton to trigger goToLanding via flow context.
frontend/src/components/controls/Romanti: Styled button wrapper over shadcn Button with pink gradient and animated effects.
frontend/src/components/effects/CursorPe: Canvas effect spawning animated petals following cursor movement, disabled on touch or reduced-motion.
frontend/src/components/effects/FallingF: Canvas effect animating falling flower sprites (rose/tulip) with variant and speed options.
frontend/src/components/effects/Floating: Creates floating animated heart emoji elements positioned randomly within a container.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sparkles: Canvas-based sparkle animation overlay that draws twinkling circles and resizes with the window.
frontend/src/components/forms/RiddleCard: Form card displaying a riddle, input, error message, and submit button with shake animation support.
frontend/src/components/media/SessionIma: Image upload component that reads a selected file as a data URL and displays a preview.
frontend/src/components/note/Handwritten: Simple card that displays a handwritten-style text note.
frontend/src/components/typography/Flora: Large floral-textured title component using background clipping and bounce animation.
frontend/src/content/strings.ts: Centralized string constants for UI text across landing, riddle, intermediate, and final pages.
frontend/src/flow/FlowProvider.tsx: Context provider managing app flow steps, attempts, and stored photos using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup with custom fonts, colors, and animations for floral and romantic UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Final flow page showing a note, heart effects, and final photo upload with a return-to-landing button.
frontend/src/pages/IntermediatePage.tsx: Intermediate flow page that lets the user upload a photo and proceed to the final step.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the landing screen with flower and sparkle effects, a floral title, subtitle, and a button that navigates to the riddle page.
frontend/src/pages/RiddlePage.tsx: Renders the riddle interface with attempts logic, error animations, and navigation to final or intermediate pages based on the user's answer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, goals, architecture, and existing feature implementations for the romantic multi-page experience.
